task.name: agent.tasks.GetDecontaminated
task.description: To get decontaminated through a decontamination site. The agent moves to decontamination site and asks for decontamination. Once agent is decontaminated, it moves to a given garage position.

parameter.name: decontaminationPlot
parameter.description: The decontamination site to use. Efficiency (delays) of decontaminatin depends on units that are operating the decontamination site. Note that the decontamination can be instantaneous if the agent reaches the decontamination site while it is not contaminated.

parameter.name: meetingPoint
parameter.description: The position to reach once decontamination is over.
